profile_positions.description:
I must admit - surviving on Upwork is one of the hardest tasks. However, if you're able to determine its worth, it's not more than a goldmine. I have met numerous business owners and professionals that have utilized my potential to scale their businesses to the next level. Bravo for that. 

I have assisted several businesses to gain exponential growth as a copywriter and business growth consultant.  Furthermore, I have generated over 8k+ a month for more than 20 businesses through SEO website copy, sales copy, email marketing, and blog posts. Had the pleasure to work with numerous startups and help them scale their business to new heights. I'm still hungry for more.

profile_positions.description:
I have been providing services as an SEO Website Copywriter, Blog writer, Email Copywriter, and Sales Page Copywriter on Fiverr for the last 4 years. 

I have been fortunate enough to generate over 10k+ a month for my 3 clients through my website and sales copy. I'm still in touch with them. They are super cool and helpful. 

I have had the opportunity to work with International enterprises of all shapes and sizes. Ultimately I have learned a lot and gained diverse experience throughout my journey as a Freelance Copywriter on Fiverr.

I'm not done yet on Fiverr. There is still music in me.

profile_positions.description:
I was an assistant editor of my University's magazine. 

This is where my interest in copywriting and editing got started. It was a launchpad where I had to work with brilliant people coming from diverse backgrounds. 

I have worked on several magazine sections ranging from Information Technology, Health, and Politics to Lifestyle, Traveling, and Modern skills. I had the best experience working with the magazine team, who used to stay late at the University trying to cover information from every angle. 

Apart from the study routine, I learned the art of staying calm under extreme conditions. All the team members had to go through rigorous testing and research phases and deal with the turnaround dates. 

That's where I adopted the skill of timely delivery, and from that, I have satisfied hundreds of my clients. I'm still working with most of them to date.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Editor of University Magazine

profile_positions.description:
Apart from my Copywriting skills, I had the pleasure of working with the Digital Media Wing of the Government of Pakistan for a year.

Worked as an IT Analyst where my role was to supervise the daily tasks of my teammates regarding ads campaigns,  blogs, and social media handles of the Government of Pakistan.

I had worked there as a Content Strategist. My job was to create new content for the running blogs and websites. Learnt the art of finding keywords using top software such as SEMrush and Ubersuggest. 

Overall. I had a good experience working with the top Software house in Pakistan. The team was excellent and extremely flexible to work with.

volunteer_experiences.description:
As a Fundraising Assistant for the biggest cancer hospital in Pakistan, I had a critical role in helping us raise funds to support our mission of providing free cancer treatment to underprivileged patients.

My responsibilities included:

Cultivating Donor Relationships -My job was to cultivate and steward donor relationships by providing regular communication, acknowledging gifts, and reporting on the impact of their support.

Organizing Fundraising Events -My role is to plan and organize fundraising events, such as galas, walks, and auctions, to raise awareness and funds for our cause.

By volunteering as a Fundraising Assistant for our cancer hospital, I have the opportunity to make a real difference in the lives of underprivileged cancer patients in Pakistan. 

I have gained valuable experience in fundraising, donor relations, and event planning, all while contributing to a worthy cause.

company.name: Shaukat Khanum Memorial Cancer Hospital and Research Centre

volunteer_experiences.description:
As a Volunteer Assistant for Who is Hussain, my vital role was supporting our team and ensuring the success of our programs. 

My responsibility Included: 

Supporting Program Planning - My job was to assist our Program Coordinators in planning and organizing events, workshops, and other educational activities.

Communicating with Participants - my role was to communicate with program participants via phone, email, and in person to provide program information and answer questions.

Managing Logistics - I used to manage logistics for our programs, including preparing materials, setting up classrooms, and coordinating transportation for participants.

Assisting with Outreach - You will assist our Outreach Coordinators in spreading the word about our programs, including posting flyers, distributing brochures, and reaching out to community organizations.

Providing Administrative Support - My job was to assist our administrative team with tasks such as data entry, filing, and general office duties.

By volunteering as a Volunteer Assistant with Who is Hussain, I have gained valuable experience in program planning, logistics management, and outreach. I had the opportunity to make a positive impact on the lives of students and families in our community.

contact.summary:
“I want your product/services, how should I transfer the money?”

This is what the first message from a customer will look like.

But only if you have a strong personal brand and a great story. 

If you are still reading, chances are you either:

1.	Approach your clients yourself (Cold outreach).
2.	Or you are getting inbound leads but they are not qualified. 

You are spending thousands of dollars on paid marketing. 
Only to get a few clients who may not even buy your product.

You may be good at what you do, but your prospects are Not Confident that you can solve their problems.

They don’t know you; they don’t know what you do, they don’t know who you help. 

You might have a fancy website and great SEO but it doesn’t mean a thing if your brand isn’t strong enough. 

You are not telling both your own story and your brand’s story properly. 

If you are asking yourself: “Okay, I get it but how do I even do all of this?”

This is exactly where I come in. 


•	LINKEDIN GHOSTWRITING (I will do all the difficult stuff on LinkedIn for you and create posts to make you an industry leader and develop your personal brand)

•	THE STORYTELLER (I will be your guide and help you develop a strong personal story and brand story, whether it be me writing your story or DIY.)

•	LINKEDIN PERSONAL BRANDING COACHING (Teaching you all the stuff that I know about LinkedIn and that has helped me grow by over 200% in the last 4 months and what not to do)

•	POWERFUL COPYWRITING (I will help you increase your conversion by writing powerful landing pages, sales pages, LinkedIn profiles, Ads, and more.)

Oh, and did I tell you, all of this comes with a 100% Money Back Guarantee?
 
No questions asked whatsoever, you say the word and I will send it back to you immediately.

Now, if you are serious about developing your personal brand and being a leader in the industry.

Send me a DM with the word “Now” or head over to my featured section and book a call.

Talk to you soon,
Hassan.

contact.summary:
International Digital Marketing Trainer & Consultant, Founder at GrowthAcad - India’s first cohort-based digital marketing education company (Live Online & Classroom Training) where you learn digital marketing & growth skills like LinkedIn Marketing, SEO, Performance Marketing, Social Media Marketing, and Growth Marketing.

Across my Journey as a international digital marketing & growth mentor, I have trained 10000+ mentees across India, Nepal, Canada, UK, USA, Middle East & Singapore. (Online & Offline)

I also consult startups mainly Edtech segment for their Early Traction & Scaling Strategy.

I started my journey with my first startup Hash & Karma (A performance-based digital marketing agency) back in 2014 I Scaled my company from Zero to 50 Clients in 2 Years working for brands from the education, e-commerce, entertainment & real estate sector

Since I was passionate about education I pivoted my career by founding NSDM INDIA - India’s premium digital marketing training institute where we trained students from 0 - to 5000 in 5 years.

Post-Pandemic Education across the globe changed and the traditional physical model became irrelevant & online education picked up in 2021 I founded GrowthAcad (India's first cohort-based digital marketing training company)

At GrowthAcad students, marketing & sales professionals, and entrepreneurs learn new-age digital marketing skills from top industry practitioners.

Currently, we are digital marketing knowledge partners with various educational institutes & universities like DY Patil University, Symbiosis, MIT ADT to name a few

Check www.growthacad.com or email at harshit.gupta91@gmail.com for digital marketing training and consulting requirements🔥

zFull.summary:
International Digital Marketing Trainer & Consultant, Founder at GrowthAcad - India’s first cohort-based digital marketing education company (Live Online & Classroom Training) where you learn digital marketing & growth skills like LinkedIn Marketing, SEO, Performance Marketing, Social Media Marketing, and Growth Marketing.

Across my Journey as a international digital marketing & growth mentor, I have trained 10000+ mentees across India, Nepal, Canada, UK, USA, Middle East & Singapore. (Online & Offline)

I also consult startups mainly Edtech segment for their Early Traction & Scaling Strategy.

I started my journey with my first startup Hash & Karma (A performance-based digital marketing agency) back in 2014 I Scaled my company from Zero to 50 Clients in 2 Years working for brands from the education, e-commerce, entertainment & real estate sector

Since I was passionate about education I pivoted my career by founding NSDM INDIA - India’s premium digital marketing training institute where we trained students from 0 - to 5000 in 5 years.

Post-Pandemic Education across the globe changed and the traditional physical model became irrelevant & online education picked up in 2021 I founded GrowthAcad (India's first cohort-based digital marketing training company)

At GrowthAcad students, marketing & sales professionals, and entrepreneurs learn new-age digital marketing skills from top industry practitioners.

Currently, we are digital marketing knowledge partners with various educational institutes & universities like DY Patil University, Symbiosis, MIT ADT to name a few

Check www.growthacad.com or email at harshit.gupta91@gmail.com for digital marketing training and consulting requirements🔥

contact.summary:
Over the last 15 years, I’ve been busy with:

• Helping tech founders to build truly unique and impactful products in numerous industries
• Owning & leading several successful startups
• Contributing to the top international SaaS platforms in the leadership role
• Conducting a successful market exit for one of my products
• Founding a product company with a wide range of services

I started my entrepreneurial journey back in 2009 by launching an eCommerce platform, ImageCMS. In 2014, I launched the next project, Premmerce, which became the top WooCommerce plugins marketplace. Bootstrapped yet profitable from day one, both products brought amazing results:

• 4k CMS and SaaS platform users
• 100k+ eCommerce plugins users
• Automattic and Pinterest partnerships

After over 7 years of activity, I organized a successful market exit for Premmerce in 2022 by selling it to a UK-based venture company.

Today, I’m primarily focused on the product development company Softblues, co-founded in partnership with @Vit Nuzhnyi in 2019. Our mission is to help other product owners create successful IT products by leveraging our expertise. We work with a wide range of international clients scaling their software products and teams regardless of the globe spot.

What are our results so far?

• Top Web Developers in London in 2023 (Clutch)
• Top Web Developers in NYC in 2023 (Clutch)
• Top Development Company in Ukraine in 2021 (Clutch)
• Most reviewed software developers in Germany

What do my company & I bring to the table?

• Detailed discovery and analysis of your business needs
• Effective product release strategy and MVP
• Designing custom market solutions from scratch that combine all the necessary tools
• Advanced service architecture, which relies on modern technologies
• Long-term technical support
• Fast engagement of the best Ukrainian IT specialists

My primary role is to help Softblues's current and potential clients with the best practices on product and team management to improve and scale their products. 

I also supervise Softblues marketing, customer engagement, finance management, and company strategy improvement.

profile_positions.title: CEO, Co-founder

profile_positions.description:
My previous experience and acquired knowledge let me implement my ideas on the international level - in 2014, I started Premmerce, one of the most popular WooCommerce plugins marketplaces.

I developed the main idea of this business, created the marketing strategy, and managed the product development process. The results were:

• 6 templates and over 20 unique plugins for WooCommerce and BigCommerce
• 4k CMS and SaaS platform users
• 100k+ eCommerce plugins users
• Automattic and Pinterest partnerships
• Profitable from day one

With the beginning of the full-scale war in Ukraine in 2022, I sold the product business to a UK-based venture company, thus completing a successful exit after more than 7 years of activity.
profile_positions.title: CEO, Founder

profile_positions.description:
Image CMS was my first full-scale startup, founded back in 2009 to help Ukrainian businesses from their customer audiences online. As CEO and founder, I was responsible for product marketing research, product management, business analysis, and team management.

When I later developed the SaaS version of ImageCMS, the results were the following:

• Over 5k business owners opened their online stores based on ImageCMS software
• The startup itself grew fivefold
• ImageCMS entered the top 10 ratings of the national and CIS content management systems

Despite the outstanding performance, the economic crisis caused by the military invasion of Ukraine in 2014 put business under threat and foregrounded the opportunities of going global.
profile_positions.title: CEO, Founder

contact.summary:
"Top bloke, top banter, and top recruiter" - Me to myself in the mirror every day.  

Founder @ Scale Genesis⛓️⛓️- I bring extensive experience in helping scale world-class sales teams. 

Throughout my career, I have been deeply involved in sales, witnessing firsthand the pivotal role that talented sales professionals play in shaping the success of organizations. At Scale Genesis, we understand that finding the right sales talent is a critical component of building a thriving business. We specialize in sourcing, assessing, and selecting top-tier sales professionals who possess the unique skills and mindset required to deliver exceptional results.

Our holistic approach to talent acquisition goes beyond traditional recruitment methods. By leveraging cutting-edge sourcing strategies, market insights, and extensive industry networks, we ensure that our clients have access to a curated pool of sales professionals who are not only highly skilled but also aligned with their company culture and values. Our proven track record of success in placing outstanding sales talent has made Scale Genesis a trusted partner for companies seeking to transform their sales organizations.

Feel free to reach out to me if you are a: 
- A project looking to scale their sales org
- A person that is interested in getting a new job in the space 
- Or someone who just wants to chat rubbish (I have plenty of memes to share on my phone)

contact.summary:
As a disability advocate and inclusion consultant, I have a passion for helping organizations create a more accessible and inclusive environment for everyone.

My deep understanding of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) combined with my senior-level corporate experience gives me a unique perspective on how disability inclusion and compliance can be integrated into an organization's overall strategy and operations.

I offer training, strategy consulting, and comprehensive needs assessments to work with organizations in implementing practical and effective processes to improve accessibility and inclusion at all levels. I take a process-oriented approach to my work, ensuring that training is not just a one-time event but combined with process improvements to result in sustainable change.

Whether you're an ERG lead, HR manager, business owner, or leader in any capacity, I would love to speak with you about how my expertise can help your organization become more inclusive and accessible.

profile_positions.description:
Founded non-profit, making immediate impact with disabled community

•	Ensured quality client management through the creation of documentation, trend tracking, and communication. 
•	Provide visibility to board of directors of performance and milestones for a portfolio of projects and initiatives.
•	Consulted with companies’ HR teams to ensure processes and procedures were in line with ADA guidelines. 
•	Created and delivered disability inclusion training to law enforcement, hospitals, and schools focusing on improved response to various disabilities including visible, invisible, non-verbal, and mental health. 
•	Recruited diverse board of directors and quickly gained community support.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Executive Director

profile_positions.description:
Consulted on disability, diversity, and inclusion methods, empowered teams, and quadrupled monthly profit

•	Redefined operations processes and systems to focus on and improve people culture, accessibility, and inclusion in accordance with each company’s unique goals and values.
o	Identified unique employment laws in APAC, EMEA, and AMER to guide program implementation. 
o	Implemented improved training, leadership development, and benchmark surveys.
•	Researched external trends, data, methodologies, and best practices, then put forward proposals to drive DEI.
•	Partnered with key stakeholders to research, analyze, and benchmark people data to strengthen diversity, inclusion, and cultural competencies across the organization as organization expanded internationally. 
•	Supported ERGs by providing operational guidance to improve structure and efficiency to reach goals.
•	Synthesized quantitative and qualitative data to develop business case and strategic recommendations, earning CEO support after proposing reorganization of teams, enabling service increase, and oversight decrease.
•	Steered operational and strategic vision to improve culture as DEI budget increased $3 to $20M and team tripled.
•	Analyzed talent demographic and monitored data trends to inform and influence strategic planning.
•	Created ERG groups and events to engage employees in sharing experiences around diversity and inclusion.
profile_positions.title: Culture & Operations Consultant

contact.summary:
Hi, I’m Keyur, Founder & CEO at GrowedIn.

We specialise in LinkedIn personal branding for VPs and C-level executives.

Let me share a quick story of how I got here.

Back when I was 16, I started writing on Quora. After 2 years, I landed my first writing gig.

Within a month, I was asked to build a team of writers for a project. While I enjoyed writing (and still do), there was something more exciting about building a team and managing the entire project.

In due course, I took charge of 90% of the content operations at the firm.

Then, in 2020, COVID hit. Most companies cut down on their marketing budget to almost nil. I had to now figure out whether to continue working with the firm or focus on academics and get a decent-paying job.

I did not want to work a 9-5, doing something that I didn’t enjoy. I wanted time freedom. I wanted to build something valuable.

Everyone was into building software, so I figured that was a quick way to make money. We built something that no one needed. The project was dropped a few months later.

As soon as we outsourced the production, we had to start making noise. LinkedIn was the best place. Within a month of posting consistently on LinkedIn, 2 things happened:

1. I ran out of ideas to write about our product.
2. I was starting to enjoy being active on LinkedIn.

I switched to writing about productivity and side-hustles instead. Around a month later, my LinkedIn account blew up. I went from 1000 followers to 7000+ followers in just a few weeks. 

It felt amazing.

Justin Welsh invited me to conduct a LinkedIn workshop for his community. I had to speak in front of 100+ entrepreneurs.

Everyone loved it and one of them reached out asking if I could write LinkedIn posts for him.

This was when I built GrowedIn.

Having worked with 40+ LinkedIn profiles over the past 2 years, we’re now experts in LinkedIn ghostwriting for C-level executives, which is our primary service. We also help with the following:

- LinkedIn Account Management
- LinkedIn Social Selling
- LinkedIn Consulting
- LinkedIn Training 

While many marketing agencies may lure with affordable prices, they often sacrifice quality. At GrowedIn, we prioritize delivering relevant and impactful messaging through your LinkedIn posts, ensuring that your profile authentically represents your true self.

If you’d like to level up your LinkedIn game, build a strong, credible, and authentic LinkedIn brand, feel free to:

1. Shoot me a DM
2. Send me an email at keyur@growedin.com 
3. Book a call: https://growedin.link/discovery

profile_positions.description:
LinkedIn is ingrained in our DNA. It's an integral part of who we are.

I've successfully nurtured my own LinkedIn account, growing it from scratch to now amassing over 37,000 engaged followers.

This has led to three key outcomes: a consistent flow of connection requests from relevant individuals, a steady influx of inbound leads, and significant engagement when I share my thoughts through LinkedIn posts.

Recognizing the power of LinkedIn, I created GrowedIn to extend my expertise and support others in achieving similar success, primarily VPs and C-level executives.

Over the past two years, we have worked with more than 40 executives, helping them in building a strong and powerful LinkedIn presence.

We thrive when working with clients who are fully committed to growing their LinkedIn influence and impact. Most of them experience a growth of 10-25% in post impressions within the first 90 days.

If you'd like to work with us, check out our case studies or book a call using the links below.

profile_positions.description:
I began by managing a large-scale Question Bank project for schools with nearly 200,000 questions. 

This experience taught me valuable lessons in leadership, management, and attention to detail.

After successfully completing the Question Bank project, I had the privilege of forming and leading a team of writers. Together, we handled numerous writing projects and helped clients gain visibility via Google Search.

As the company grew, I took on more responsibilities, including writing blogs and handling Quora marketing for well-known Indian brands.
profile_positions.title: Content Manager

profile_positions.description:
This position marked my entry into the professional world - marketing, freelancing, SEO, and other cool stuff.

I spent close to 2 months working on a fairly simple Question Bank project writing about 100 MCQs a day.
profile_positions.title: Content Writer

profile_positions.description:
On my personal website, I sometimes write essays on productivity, side hustles, and leadership.

I also regularly send out a weekly newsletter called Sunday Pills, where I explore five thought-provoking ideas. Each issue can be conveniently read within a concise 10-minute timeframe. (Link below)

I am currently developing a new project called '100 Days,' set to be launched in the upcoming weeks.   Here's a trailer:

100 DAYS - 

Who do you want to be in the next 100 Days?

We always want to be a better version of ourselves, follow our passion, learn new skills, and monetise them along the way.

But most of us are stuck on one of these problems:

1. We're unsure of what to learn or where to start.
2. Figuring out how to learn effectively can be a challenge.
3. Consistency and staying motivated can be tough.
4. Sometimes, we lack the right support system and accountability partners.
5. Access to valuable mentorship and guidance can be limited.
6. We might miss out on those small but crucial details when we're self-employed.

The 100 Days Community is a solution to all the above problems.

Hit that "Join for FREE" button and look out for resources, guidance, hacks, and live workshops that are coming your way soon!
profile_positions.title: Content Creator

profile_positions.description:
Thrive Content marked my very first business venture.

Our vision was to establish a platform that revolutionized the content creation process, enabling clients to effortlessly place an order within a mere 5 minutes and receive the final written piece in just 48 hours.

Think of it as Freelancer.com or Upwork, but with a curated team of highly skilled freelancers.

We aimed to solve the challenges commonly associated with content mills.

Our approach was simple: a talented team of writers could select projects based on their preference, eliminating the need for bidding and uncertain project allocation. For clients, it offered a hassle-free way to quickly order content while ensuring top-notch quality.

We had to shut this down as we couldn't crack the user acquisition strategy.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
During my time at Humanbot, I gained valuable experience in content planning and strategy.

Working alongside a talented team of copywriters and SEO experts, our main focus was to create engaging messaging that captured the attention of our target audience and encouraged them to take action, such as booking a call.

I primarily worked on technical topics, delving into the details to provide valuable content.

Additionally, I was responsible for writing and publishing monthly blog posts to boost the company's online presence and connect with relevant audiences.

This role gave me fairly good exposure to how content marketing really works and made me realize its importance in the long term.
profile_positions.title: Content Marketing Manager

zFull.summary:
Hi, I’m Keyur, Founder & CEO at GrowedIn.

We specialise in LinkedIn personal branding for VPs and C-level executives.

Let me share a quick story of how I got here.

Back when I was 16, I started writing on Quora. After 2 years, I landed my first writing gig.

Within a month, I was asked to build a team of writers for a project. While I enjoyed writing (and still do), there was something more exciting about building a team and managing the entire project.

In due course, I took charge of 90% of the content operations at the firm.

Then, in 2020, COVID hit. Most companies cut down on their marketing budget to almost nil. I had to now figure out whether to continue working with the firm or focus on academics and get a decent-paying job.

I did not want to work a 9-5, doing something that I didn’t enjoy. I wanted time freedom. I wanted to build something valuable.

Everyone was into building software, so I figured that was a quick way to make money. We built something that no one needed. The project was dropped a few months later.

As soon as we outsourced the production, we had to start making noise. LinkedIn was the best place. Within a month of posting consistently on LinkedIn, 2 things happened:

1. I ran out of ideas to write about our product.
2. I was starting to enjoy being active on LinkedIn.

I switched to writing about productivity and side-hustles instead. Around a month later, my LinkedIn account blew up. I went from 1000 followers to 7000+ followers in just a few weeks. 

It felt amazing.

Justin Welsh invited me to conduct a LinkedIn workshop for his community. I had to speak in front of 100+ entrepreneurs.

Everyone loved it and one of them reached out asking if I could write LinkedIn posts for him.

This was when I built GrowedIn.

Having worked with 40+ LinkedIn profiles over the past 2 years, we’re now experts in LinkedIn ghostwriting for C-level executives, which is our primary service. We also help with the following:

- LinkedIn Account Management
- LinkedIn Social Selling
- LinkedIn Consulting
- LinkedIn Training 

While many marketing agencies may lure with affordable prices, they often sacrifice quality. At GrowedIn, we prioritize delivering relevant and impactful messaging through your LinkedIn posts, ensuring that your profile authentically represents your true self.

If you’d like to level up your LinkedIn game, build a strong, credible, and authentic LinkedIn brand, feel free to:

1. Shoot me a DM
2. Send me an email at keyur@growedin.com 
3. Book a call: https://growedin.link/discovery
zFull.sub_title: LinkedIn personal branding for VPs and C-level executives | CEO @ GrowedIn

contact.titleDescription:
You know you need marketing to attract new customers and keep existing ones, but you also need to focus on your current customers.

You are really good at your business - it’s your passion and livelihood, and you need to focus your energy, time, and efforts on growing your business. 

But you struggle with marketing your business, getting in front of the right audience at the right time with the right message, and figuring out what sets you apart. 

Just imagine if you could have a team of expert marketers passionate about your brand, working behind the scenes to make it shine. 

By leveraging the power of your brand, you can create marketing that resonates with your customers and sets you apart from your competitors.

At It’s Simply Digital, we specialize in crafting custom marketing strategies that make your brand stand out. 

We work with you to understand your unique value proposition and target audience, and then we create content that resonates with them. 

From social media management to email campaigns, we do it all.

No more wasting time and money on unreliable freelancers. No more stress and frustration trying to figure out what works. Our team of experts is here to help you every step of the way.

Let us take your brand to new heights. 

Join the ranks of our satisfied clients who have seen real business results from our marketing strategies. 

Contact us today and let’s start creating magic together.
contact.reactor_title: Find your voice, tell your story, and create inspiring content that gets your target audience to convert.
contact.summary:
You're killing it in your field, but let's face it – branding and content building are bogging you down.

Do you often find yourself saying:

➡️ "I don't have enough time to focus on content creation and build my brand."
➡️ "I don't have the expertise to create compelling content and capture my audience's attention."
➡️ "I don't know how to measure the effectiveness of my marketing efforts, so I don't see the point."

As a CEO or business owner, getting caught up in the day-to-day demands can leave little time or energy to focus on brand building and content creation. 

This can lead to frustrating and overwhelming feelings of inadequacy, leaving you wondering if you'll ever be able to compete in a crowded marketplace.

I get it. You'd rather do what you love!

So we offer you the ultimate branding and content-building antidote. No more humdrum copy that makes your audience snooze!  

We craft engaging stories that'll catapult your brand into the spotlight, making your customers wonder how they have ever lived without you. 

Let us turn your time-consuming & overwhelming content creation process into a done-for-you package with a bow on top!


Send me a DM, and let the marketing magic begin!
contact.occupation: We make marketing your brand as simple as possible, so you can focus on what matters most to you: building your business. | Podcast Host – It's Simply Life

profile_positions.description:
You own a small business or building a personal brand.

You know you need marketing to attract new customers and keep existing ones, but you also need to focus on your current customers.

You are really good at your business - it’s your passion and livelihood, and you need to focus your energy, time, and efforts on growing your business. 

But you struggle with marketing your business, getting in front of the right audience at the right time with the right message, and figuring out what sets you apart. 

Just imagine if you could have a team of expert marketers passionate about your brand, working behind the scenes to make it shine. 

By leveraging the power of your brand, you can create marketing that resonates with your customers and sets you apart from your competitors.

At It’s Simply Digital, we specialize in crafting custom marketing strategies that make your brand stand out. 

We work with you to understand your unique value proposition and target audience, and then we create content that resonates with them. 

From social media management to email campaigns, we do it all.

No more wasting time and money on unreliable freelancers. No more stress and frustration trying to figure out what works. Our team of experts is here to help you every step of the way.

Let us take your brand to new heights. 

Join the ranks of our satisfied clients who have seen real business results from our marketing strategies. 

Contact us today and let’s start creating magic together.

zFull.summary:
You're killing it in your field, but let's face it – branding and content building are bogging you down.

Do you often find yourself saying:

➡️ "I don't have enough time to focus on content creation and build my brand."
➡️ "I don't have the expertise to create compelling content and capture my audience's attention."
➡️ "I don't know how to measure the effectiveness of my marketing efforts, so I don't see the point."

As a CEO or business owner, getting caught up in the day-to-day demands can leave little time or energy to focus on brand building and content creation. 

This can lead to frustrating and overwhelming feelings of inadequacy, leaving you wondering if you'll ever be able to compete in a crowded marketplace.

I get it. You'd rather do what you love!

So we offer you the ultimate branding and content-building antidote. No more humdrum copy that makes your audience snooze!  

We craft engaging stories that'll catapult your brand into the spotlight, making your customers wonder how they have ever lived without you. 

Let us turn your time-consuming & overwhelming content creation process into a done-for-you package with a bow on top!


Send me a DM, and let the marketing magic begin!

contact.summary:
If you're reading this, it could be because:

- You're really into Web3 stuff.
- You're a designer and want to improve your skills.
- You're liking my content, so thanks for your support.

I kicked off my creative agency from the humble corner of my bedroom after working for 7 years as a freelancer designer. 

I wanted to work with Web3 brands because I'm passionate about tech and I believe in the power of building decentralized communities. 

I'm convinced that Web3 has the potential to enhance trust and privacy, but what really drives me is the idea that it can pave the way for a more just and equitable future.

But here's the deal, I discovered that a lot of you Web3 entrepreneurs out there are facing some major challenges, like:

1. A general lack of awareness of Web3 from the average user.
2. Struggling to effectively communicate your value to your audience.
3. Lack of funding and not being able to generate a steady flow of cash.

This means you might end up making costly mistakes or worrying nonstop about where your next customer will come from or whether the masses will actually get what Web3 is all about.

That's why I started to share tips and insights every single day about how to boost Web3 brand awareness through branding and user-centered design. It's been quite the journey, but I love every part of it.

You can attract more users and disrupt the space, through branding and UX:

→ It Boosts customer retention - more customers.
→ It drives conversion rates - users to take action.
→ It minimizes user errors - leading to cost savings.
→ It differentiates you from competitors - enhances brand reputation.

Here's what you'll get:

👉 BRAND STRATEGY: We'll revitalize your business with a fresh and powerful new look and strategy that resonates better with your target audience.

👉 WEB DESIGN: We'll make your website visually appealing, responsive, and use user-centered methodologies to attract and retain visitors.

👉 UX REVAMP: We'll analyze user behavior, pain points, and preferences, and implement the elements and functionalities that meet their needs.

👉 BRAND BOOST KIT: We'll give you a kit including social media and marketing materials to create a powerful and cohesive brand image that increases your authority.

Want to know more about the process? 🤔
Book your 1:1 Free consultation:

https://calendly.com/mgsalcedon/15min

profile_positions.description:
If you've made it this far, you're likely curious as to how my background in Telecommunications engineering fits into my current business.

You see, being a tech enthusiast is an integral part of who I am. 

I have a passion for learning about innovative solutions, with a particular interest in IoT protocols and Satellite communications. I possess coding skills as well as the ability to create electronic circuits.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "What does this have to do with design?" 
While it may not seem related, I recognized the potential to leverage these skills in the Web3 space.

As a university professor, I often found myself teaching my students about Starlink and other technical topics. At the same time, I began freelancing and creating unique designs for clients around the world.

Despite being referred to as the "youngest teacher," I loved my job.

However, in 2018, I discovered Bitcoin and became in love with it.
One day I decided to focus all my efforts on designing for Web3 business. 

So I did.

And I won’t lie – turning my passion into a business felt incredibly good.
Web3 is the perfect match for creativity and tech.

So, how does being a "University Professor" make me a better Designer than I am today? 
1. It's easier for me to understand the technicalities of Web3.
2. I learnt how to explain complex things easily.
3. It's me being me. Authenticity rules!
profile_positions.title: Profesor universitario

zFull.summary:
If you're reading this, it could be because:

- You're really into Web3 stuff.
- You're a designer and want to improve your skills.
- You're liking my content, so thanks for your support.

I kicked off my creative agency from the humble corner of my bedroom after working for 7 years as a freelancer designer. 

I wanted to work with Web3 brands because I'm passionate about tech and I believe in the power of building decentralized communities. 

I'm convinced that Web3 has the potential to enhance trust and privacy, but what really drives me is the idea that it can pave the way for a more just and equitable future.

But here's the deal, I discovered that a lot of you Web3 entrepreneurs out there are facing some major challenges, like:

1. A general lack of awareness of Web3 from the average user.
2. Struggling to effectively communicate your value to your audience.
3. Lack of funding and not being able to generate a steady flow of cash.

This means you might end up making costly mistakes or worrying nonstop about where your next customer will come from or whether the masses will actually get what Web3 is all about.

That's why I started to share tips and insights every single day about how to boost Web3 brand awareness through branding and user-centered design. It's been quite the journey, but I love every part of it.

You can attract more users and disrupt the space, through branding and UX:

→ It Boosts customer retention - more customers.
→ It drives conversion rates - users to take action.
→ It minimizes user errors - leading to cost savings.
→ It differentiates you from competitors - enhances brand reputation.

Here's what you'll get:

👉 BRAND STRATEGY: We'll revitalize your business with a fresh and powerful new look and strategy that resonates better with your target audience.

👉 WEB DESIGN: We'll make your website visually appealing, responsive, and use user-centered methodologies to attract and retain visitors.

👉 UX REVAMP: We'll analyze user behavior, pain points, and preferences, and implement the elements and functionalities that meet their needs.

👉 BRAND BOOST KIT: We'll give you a kit including social media and marketing materials to create a powerful and cohesive brand image that increases your authority.

Want to know more about the process? 🤔
Book your 1:1 Free consultation:

https://calendly.com/mgsalcedon/15min

Business Professionals, let me ask you a quick question.

Which Business out of the two is better positioned:

Small Business A:

- Built your business off referrals but have no system.
- You're a seasoned expert but internet has no idea.
- Lack of LinkedIn presence and overall strategy.
- Little or no CRM used to track opportunities.
- Absence of a defined sales process.
- No consistent lead generation.
- Don’t really understand AI.

Small Business B:

- LinkedIn markets while you sleep.
- Tracks effectively with a simple CRM.
- AI is embedded in your business processes.
- Formal sales process that closes more deals.
- Getting at consistent leads p/month off LinkedIn.
- The internet knows you’re an expert in your niche.
- System creates referrals without you being involved.


Obviously, you're shouting "Option B" right now.

But,

Be honest with yourself and answer these questions:

1. When did you last give LinkedIn a go?

You’re leaving $$$$ on the table.

And your probably wasting a ton of time networking

While you sleep.

It's time to invest and build your brand on LinkedIn

Don't wait for AI and the millennials to take your market.

contact.summary:
I am a Harvard-educated CEO and PCC certified, leadership/executive/life coach.  Serving the global community as a leadership coach, psychological safety team coach, consultant, & inspirational speaker.  I am a member of Marshall Goldsmith’s (World’s #1 Executive Coach) elite team of executive coaches. I have collaborated with 150+ leaders on five continents to bring out their best performance & more fulfilled life -- including clients at Google, Amazon, Reddit, Sony, Microsoft, and many others.

I listen deeply to clients and tailor my methodology to their needs.  I employ 360 assessment data, mindfulness techniques, action plan development, music, leadership theories, happiness research, leadership articles & videos, improv comedy training, & more to serve clients in a way that is powerful and fun.

Recently I led webinars on leading remote teams during the pandemic, leader resiliency, creating a culture of positivity, and navigating the way forward during this public health and economic crisis. I also trained the executive team of an Australian company "How to Lead Like a Coach," a European team on "Self-Leadership and Happiness," and co-presented a women’s leadership webinar. I am conducting original research into leading human-machine (artificial intelligence) teams and co-presented our initial findings at the International Leadership Association's (ILA) Global Conference 2018.

I am a lifelong learner.  I previously studied and collaborated with leadership scholars James MacGregor Burns (Pulitzer Prize-winner), Georgia Sorenson (ILA co-founder), and Ron Heifetz (Harvard University). I am currently a part-time Ph.D. student in Organizational Leadership, regularly take advanced coach training to increase my capabilities, and learn from my clients whom I am privileged to serve.

Previously I served for 19 years in the United States government including leadership positions at the White House, U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS), U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ), and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) – with roles in communications, employee engagement, innovation, intergovernmental liaison, knowledge management, human resources/leadership development, information technology, administration, and high-profile multi-agency initiatives.

During a decade of FBI service, I was the first global chief of internal communications, deputy chief knowledge officer (intersection of people, processes, IT systems, and innovation), and co-director of a multi-agency law enforcement initiative reducing violence in the country's most violent cities.

profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant & Coach

profile_positions.description:
WHO I HELP:
	I help successful people become even more successful and achieve positive, lasting change in behavior; for themselves, their people, and their teams.

OUR PROCESS:
	As part of Marshall Goldsmith’s select team of certified coaches, I use a Stakeholder-Centered Coaching process to help leaders stop behaviors that don’t add value and replace them with ones that do.  The leader's stakeholders provide input on areas for growth and suggestions for the leader's action plan.
	Marshall Goldsmith is widely recognized as one of the world's most influential leadership thinkers and top executive coach.  He is the author of the best-selling books ‘What Got You Here Won’t Get You There’ and ‘Triggers,’ 
	Our coaching process is proven, measurable, used worldwide by over 11,000 leaders and has a 95% success rate.

WHO IS BENEFITING:
	Over 150 of the Fortune 500 use this coaching process to help their leaders perform at a higher level including Ford, IBM, Johnson & Johnson, Microsoft, Toyota, 3M, Apple, AT&T, KPMG, and Intel.
	Public sector and nonprofit leaders at the FBI, U.S. Department of Defense, World Bank, American Red Cross, and many others have also used this process to accelerate leadership growth.
profile_positions.title: Certified Executive Coach

volunteer_experiences.description: I serve as a volunteer Instructor in the Uniformed Services University (USU) F. The LEAD mission is "to forge health leaders who will care for uniformed services personnel and their families."  In the program, we train U.S. military medical officers in leadership based on the Leader/ Follower conceptual framework and delivered across the years of education and training at USU.

I have been a volunteer with the Maryland State chapter of the Hugh O'Brian Youth (HOBY) Leadership since 1988. Most recently I served several terms as Vice President of the Board of Trustees and continue to present at HOBY events.

I am conducting original research into leading human-machine (artificial intelligence) teams and co-presented our initial findings at the International Leadership Association's (ILA) Global Conference 2018.

I am a lifelong learner.  I previously studied and collaborated with leadership scholars James MacGregor Burns (Pulitzer Prize-winner), Georgia Sorenson (ILA co-founder), and Ron Heifetz (Harvard University). I am currently a part-time Ph.D. student in Organizational Leadership, regularly take advanced coach training to increase my capabilities, and learn from my clients whom I am privileged to serve.

Previously I served for 19 years in the United States government including leadership positions at the White House, U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS), U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ), and Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) – with roles in communications, employee engagement, innovation, intergovernmental liaison, knowledge management, human resources/leadership development, information technology, administration, and high-profile multi-agency initiatives.

During a decade of FBI service, I was the first global chief of internal communications, deputy chief knowledge officer (intersection of people, processes, IT systems, and innovation), and co-director of a multi-agency law enforcement initiative reducing violence in the country's most violent cities.

contact.summary:
Most insurance leaders struggle to recruit young candidates and even when they do, they tend to leave the industry just as quickly

Because most of their recruitment efforts don’t bring in a positive ROI

E.g. 

1: Spending a bomb on social media ad agencies only to get poor / unqualified leads 
2: Investing in job sites only to get zero to poor results 
3: Hiring a recruiter who can't seem to find the candidate profile you're looking for

As a result, you end up wasting time with the wrong profile of candidates and feel frustrated trying to recruit

I get it - recruitment shouldn't be any harder than sales (Life would have been much easier being a producer, right?)

Yet you feel like you're the one being interviewed when in fact, you're the interviewer!

If you want to be a leader who is able to attract Millennial / Gen Z candidates into your agency effortlessly, you need to build your influence on LinkedIn

Unfortunately, the talents you’re looking for, aren’t looking for you. Yet.

If you have to find them, persuade them to join you, and change their lives for the better… 

You need to understand them better than they understand themselves

You need to make this career appealing and 'sexy' to the young generation

They are very skeptical about their rate of success upon joining this industry and still believe the old stigma from the past

Plus there are very few insurance leaders selling this career on LinkedIn - with conviction!

You have no idea how fast you can recruit Millennials / Gen Zs once you fully understand how to influence them

So if you're interested to grow your agency,

Here's how we can help:

1. LinkedIn Branding Fundamentals Training

The overall result is three-fold:

1. You have your calendar fully booked out with candidate interviews

projects.description:
In today's globalized world, working in multi-cultural teams and dealing with business partners of diverse backgrounds has become part of business. Dynamic and knowledgeable teams drawing on skills and expertise from all over the globe create business and solutions across industries on a daily basis. Cultural differences can cause misunderstandings and conflicts in the workplace, resulting in lost deals or low productivity. Successful structures, processes and communication pathways in one cultural context may appear ineffective in another because of culturally based assumptions and expectations.  

This half-day / full day program includes interactive and hands-on activities that will keep participants fully energized, in a unique setting on board a private sailing yacht out at sea. The idyllic Southern Islands also provide a relaxed environment for participants to learn and bond with one another.  Through this program, participants will be equipped with

1.Knowledge of how cultural differences impact business and team processes 
2.A set of tools on how to apply this understanding to the workplace 
3.Deeper understanding of one another’s communication styles 
4.Stronger sense of teamwork  
5.A certificate of completion for all participants & a prize hamper for the winning team

This program is designed for employees who are working in multi-cultural teams or communicating/liaising with international clients/vendors/partners of different cultures, such as (but not limited to):
 Multi-cultural teams
 Sales Teams  
 Teams in delivery/implementation roles 
 Sales Associates together with their Clients 
 Purchasing Teams with their Vendors 
 Sales/Marketing Teams together with their Distributors/Retail Partners 
 Regional Directors 
 Local Companies planning to expand internationally 
 Western Executives/Managers who have relocated to Singapore 

Ideal Group Size: 10 – 15 pax
(For larger groups, please write into us at enquiry@youtraining.sg)

profile_positions.description:
You know how young people don't stay in companies as long anymore?

The work I do addresses this

Over the years, financial, social & technological trends have shaped the young generation. It's influenced 

- their decisions around Adulting (getting married, buying a house, having children etc)

- the companies they apply to

- how they turn up at work

- how they buy products & services

Due to this, older generations often disapprove of their sense of entitlement or lack of commitment

"They're impatient to climb the career ladder without putting in the work"

"They're very vocal and rude"

"They're always on their phone"

So they fail to provide the guidance, mentorship and connection youths crave

With the generational gap having grown W--I--D--E--R over the years, companies are noticing a dip in their employees' productivity due to an increasing number of intergenerational conflicts 💥

The widened generation gap

- Creates a higher attrition of the younger generation because they feel unheard & unable to contribute

- Stops the tacit knowledge transfer

- Causes companies to stagnate without progress 

- Hinders performance & innovation

- Leads to the deterioration of your employer brand 

Hi - I'm Vivek Iyyani and it is my mission to support leaders as they adapt to leading across generations in the new normal

Whether you want to 

- hire me as your speaker

- conduct training programs for your teams

- do a organisation-wide consultation project

I guarantee I will improve your understanding of the multi-generational workforce and share unique ways to engage with them.

Organisations need both the wisdom & knowledge of the older generations and the energy, enthusiasm & environmental mindfulness of the youths

Leaders have to foster a culture where everyone feels equally valuable, respected, recognised & able to make an impact

The overall result is three-fold -- a stronger employer brand, higher productivity, better retention of Millennial/Gen Z employees

profile_positions.description:
The Ultimate Guide for every Millennial who’s moving into management

Millennials will be our next great generation of leaders. They are quickly filling executive and management roles at all levels. If you’re one of them, you’re probably leading not just your peers, but also Baby Boomers, Gen Xers (who have been around much longer than you) and of course, the new kids on the block, the Gen Zs. The younger generation of leaders are rejecting old school leadership practices outright, forcing organizations to rethink and reshape the way leaders lead.

Leadership no longer demands a corner office, an official title or even a physical workplace. The terms ‘boss’ and ‘supervisor’ sound foreign to today’s employees. Effective leaders are described as inspiring influencers, mentors and advocates today. Millennial leaders face the ultimate challenge of overcoming generational differences, reverse ageism, motivating an isolated, remote, gig and burnt- out workforce, while juggling all the responsibilities and expectations as a leader.
profile_positions.title: Author

profile_positions.description:
In any given industry, there are companies that struggle with employee engagement and retention issues and then there are companies that have piles and piles of job applications on their desk. 

What sets the latter apart?

By 2025, 75% of the global working population will consist of Millennials. They are the largest generation entering the workforce, with 2 Billion population size globally and 1.16 Billion in Asia alone. They will form the majority of the workforce and become the new leaders to take the company to newer heights. 

Emerging trends in the marketplace include Millennials job hopping from one job to the other within short time spans (2 years). In March 2017, Singapore & Malaysia ranked the lowest in terms of Employee engagement in Asia, with a poor statistic of 59%, according to research by AON HEWITT. 

This phenomenon is increasingly befuddling Bosses and HR Managers alike. The question on everyone's mind is  "What do Millennials want?"

------------------

In this book, I share the specific goals and dreams that Millennials harbour. Based on my research since 2007, I have worked with over 10,000 Millennials while training them since their school days. This book reflects the key areas Millennials want to be engaged in. 

This book is about understanding the Millennial Generation, the problems and challenges they face, and how we as an organisation can develop them to become strong leaders in their company and industry. 

Organisations with peak performance teams, low attrition and high productivity can focus on doing their best work, giving their clients the best service and have more time and resources to continually innovate and develop on old ideas to solve bigger and better problems.

------------------

This book addresses the key competencies Managers require to be skilled in, and it also helps the Manager to get inside their world to understand what their intrinsic and extrinsic motivations are in life and at the workplace.
profile_positions.title: Author

profile_positions.description:
As a Youth Program Director, my responsibilities were to ensure we empowered the youths in schools - primary to polytechnic level received enough experiences that helped them improve their social-emotional learning values. 

We focused on building youths' Self Awareness, Self Management, Social Awareness, Relationship Management and empowered them to ensure they had Responsible Decision Making Skills. By providing outdoor and indoor based experiences that test the characters of the youths, we helped them realise more about themselves in such settings. 

We specialise in designing Situational Tests that ensure students are able to integrate the leadership and communication skills they learn in the classroom and apply them in real life situations. To top it off, we record the students in action and help them look at themselves from a 3rd persons' point of view.

As a Youth Program Director, I was in charge of managing our team of trainers and facilitators who engaged with the students as well as innovate new programs to suit the clients' needs.
profile_positions.title: Youth Program Director

volunteer_experiences.description: I am currently volunteering in the Mitra Program currently conducted by the Ministry of Social and Family Development (MSF) and Hindu Centre for juvenile delinquents who are At-Risk of relapse. This is a 25-week program where we work with the participants to empower them to be more confident and have a higher self esteem while inculcating values at the same time. My role as a volunteer is to engage the participants with exciting games and facilitate the learning based on these activities to bring out the key behavioural patterns, thoughts and beliefs. Once awareness is created, the participants will be able to accept and adapt their behaviour to suit their new goals for a new lease at life.

company.name: Ministry of Social and Family Development, Singapore (MSF)

volunteer_experiences.description: I served in SICCI to facilitate the various initiatives the Chambers has to provide for the Business Community.

company.name: Singapore Indian Chamber of Commerce & Industry

volunteer_experiences.description: RangDeHoli is an annual event that promotes the Indian Culture of Holi - A summer festival that is celebrated in India with the use of colours. It is a fun event with lots of colours and songs. As a volunteer, I helped by contributing some youth based activities that can engage the crowd for the event and make it as fun as possible.

I volunteer at the Boy's Home located at RamaKrishna Mission. My role involves engaging a young boy on Sunday's while he is at the Boy's Home. While most boys have the fortune of going home during the weekends, this boy rarely gets the chance and tends to feel lonely and restless. I engage him every sunday by playing sports with him such as Soccer, Badminton and even board games.

awards.description:
First Look Asia featured me and 2 other Millennials in their show to learn the truth about the Millennials based on my book. In this interview, I share about the concepts I wrote about in my book that Millennials and Managers that work closely with Millennials.

Millennials need Clarity - Organisations need to show them what's in it for them long term.

Millennials need Alignment - Organisations need to ensure they hire Millennials that are aligned with the Company's Values and Beliefs

Millennials need Patience - Organisations need to develop habits in Millennials to help them overcome their Instant Gratification mindset. 

Millennials need Resilience - Organisations needs to help Millennials build Resilience to handle difficult conversations at the workplace. 

Millennials need Focus - Organisations to empower Millennials to stay focused without being distracted by the next notification in their phone or internet browser

contact.summary:
Tl;DR version: 
 
I help startups to build their presence online through content marketing and generate sales through persuasive copy! 🚀

Looking for someone to help you build your personal brand on LinkedIn? DM me right away! 👉🏻

Longer version. 

Hey! 👋

Good to know that you aren’t lazy. Give yourself a pat. 

Bitter Truth: You won't open10 tabs of websites and read long articles but you can watch 10 videos back to back. 

Why is that? 

The introduction of short-form video content has decreased the attention span of the users. Video is more engaging. 

I have helped eliminate this problem for startups and coaches. 🙌🏻

“So tell me Misley how can we solve this!?”

It’s simple, to make your website get more eyeballs, create content that is engaging and for which the visitor keeps coming back!

🎯 Nothing beats a WELL-RESEARCHED, PLAGIARISM-FREE, PERSUASIVE, and IN-DEPTH written article. 🎯

I can help you achieve all of this. 

MY SERVICES: 📃

-Website content
-Ad Copy that sells 
-LinkedIn personal branding and lead generation
-Social Media posts 
-Emails and Newsletters
-Short stories (From a national award winner)

contact.summary:
Are you a business owner?


Who is struggling to sell his products or services?

You know that your product is of the best quality and is actually what people need.

Still, you can't get customers for it.

I get you.

I understand the root cause of your problem.

It is all about “Marketing” and “Personal Branding”

You are not marketing your product or service.

You do not build your brand through which you can show it.

Think about this!

The entire world is engaged in social media.

And you are using different strategies to sell your product or service.

Neglecting the power of social media.

How can you get customers if you do not have an audience who knows about your product or services?

I know you've got it.

So, it is time to build your “Personal Brand” and “market” your products or services through social media.

That is where I come in.

My name is Monsoor, and I specialize in helping small to large-range business owners as you build their online presence through social media and increase their sales.

Over the past two years, I have experience assisting business owners of all sizes to market their products or services.

In today's quickly changing social media ecosystem, "one-size-fits-all" marketing methods are losing effectiveness.
Every business is different, and so do its needs.

Here is what you can get from me:

- Content Creation
- Audience Growth
- Increase in Sales
- Business Leads Generation
- Enlarged Visibility
- Consistent Branding
- Engagement and Interaction
- Social Media Strategies and Planning 

I possess winning strategies that not only elevate your brand’s prominence but also drive impressive sales figures.
If you're ready to propel your online presence to new heights, don't hesitate to get in touch right now!

contact.summary:
Hello there! If you're reading this, then congratulations! You're one step closer to unlocking the power of LinkedIn and taking your career or business to the next level.


As a personal branding strategist, I work with founders, coaches, freelancers, and job seekers to create customised personal branding plans that will make you irresistible to high-paying clients and endless job opportunities.


Now, you might be thinking, "Why should I focus on my Personal Brand?


Well, let me tell you, it's the secret sauce to success.

🚀  Helps you establish your credibility and reputation. 

🚀 Makes it easier to remember you from your competitors. 

🚀 Advances your career and leads to more opportunities. 

🚀 Monetizes your content effectively.


And trust me, I know what I'm talking about.


After struggling to find clients, I turned to LinkedIn, worked on my personal brand and landed my first 6-figure client in just 3 months. 


As a small-town girl from Araria Court, Bihar, India, I never imagined I could work with people across 5 countries while managing my Home. 


All thanks to LinkedIn.


Now, I'm here to help you do the same.


✅  LinkedIn Personal Branding: Build customers and differentiate yourself from the market by converting your profile into a lead magnet. 

✅  LinkedIn Profile Optimization: Get an attractive and Professional-looking profile that helps you attract job opportunities and business leads. 

✅ LinkedIn 1:1 Consultancy: Only 90 minutes to spare, get a customised plan for your LinkedIn growth. 

✅  LinkedIn Job Search: I’ll help you land your dream job. 

✅ LinkedIn Freelancing: A 100-day plan to attract high-paying freelance clients. 


I offer a money back if you don't get the results. Here comes the best part, I never had to return a single penny!  


I have- 

🚀  Converted more than 20+ LinkedIn profiles into a landing page with 100% client satisfaction.

 🚀 Helped more than 150 job-seekers and freelancers to attract their dream opportunities from LinkedIn. 


Not bragging, but my featured section and recommendations speak for the results I bring to the table. 


So, if you're ready to take the leap and invest in yourself and your brand, then let's chat! 


Slide into my DMs and let's create a plan to make your goals a reality. Trust me, your future self will thank you.

zFull.summary:
Hello there! If you're reading this, then congratulations! You're one step closer to unlocking the power of LinkedIn and taking your career or business to the next level.


As a personal branding strategist, I work with founders, coaches, freelancers, and job seekers to create customised personal branding plans that will make you irresistible to high-paying clients and endless job opportunities.


Now, you might be thinking, "Why should I focus on my Personal Brand?


Well, let me tell you, it's the secret sauce to success.

🚀  Helps you establish your credibility and reputation. 

🚀 Makes it easier to remember you from your competitors. 

🚀 Advances your career and leads to more opportunities. 

🚀 Monetizes your content effectively.


And trust me, I know what I'm talking about.


After struggling to find clients, I turned to LinkedIn, worked on my personal brand and landed my first 6-figure client in just 3 months. 


As a small-town girl from Araria Court, Bihar, India, I never imagined I could work with people across 5 countries while managing my Home. 


All thanks to LinkedIn.


Now, I'm here to help you do the same.


✅  LinkedIn Personal Branding: Build customers and differentiate yourself from the market by converting your profile into a lead magnet. 

✅  LinkedIn Profile Optimization: Get an attractive and Professional-looking profile that helps you attract job opportunities and business leads. 

✅ LinkedIn 1:1 Consultancy: Only 90 minutes to spare, get a customised plan for your LinkedIn growth. 

✅  LinkedIn Job Search: I’ll help you land your dream job. 

✅ LinkedIn Freelancing: A 100-day plan to attract high-paying freelance clients. 


I offer a money back if you don't get the results. Here comes the best part, I never had to return a single penny!  


I have- 

🚀  Converted more than 20+ LinkedIn profiles into a landing page with 100% client satisfaction.

 🚀 Helped more than 150 job-seekers and freelancers to attract their dream opportunities from LinkedIn. 


Not bragging, but my featured section and recommendations speak for the results I bring to the table. 


So, if you're ready to take the leap and invest in yourself and your brand, then let's chat! 


Slide into my DMs and let's create a plan to make your goals a reality. Trust me, your future self will thank you.
zFull.sub_title: Helping You Land Your Dream Job and Dream Clients |  LinkedIn Personal Branding Strategist | Digital Marketing | LinkedIn Coach | Helped 150+ Job-Seekers & Freelancers to land Dream Opportunities

My career started as an assistant golf course superintendent in one of the oldest golf clubs in Kuala Lumpur after graduating with a Bachelor of Science in Agricultural and being promoted to Golf Course Superintendent two years later.

 Four years later, I was offered as Golf Course Superintendent at another reputable Golf Course in Kuala Lumpur. I oversaw the golf course construction and eventually to the maintenance stage. 
Curiosity regarding the investment world and financial literacy never thoughts in school made me further my self-study related to the subjects. 

Long story short, 2021 is my 20th Anniversary with Public Mutual Berhad. It has created my perpetual passive income indefinitely and been able to embark on my other interest and study in Chinese metaphysics.

contact.title: Owner, Executive Career Strategist
contact.name: Maureen McCann, Executive Career Strategist 💎
contact.summary:
You're looking for an employer who values and rewards your wisdom and experience.

If it's been a while since you've been in the job market and you're not sure you're up to doing it alone, working with me will help you feel more clarity and less chaos. Together, we'll stop the 'freefall' feeling that comes with changing jobs. 

We'll focus on what matters most - finding a career that fuels you.

Be the creator, designer and influencer of your career. 

What we'll do together: 
***************************
💡 Identify the best strategy for your unique situation 

💡 Target and tailor your job search to your location, industry, company and position 

💡 Analyze your job search strategy to uncover what’s missing

💡 Identify immediate course(s) of action

💡 Develop a comprehensive career strategy 

💡 Progress you and your career forward

WHY WORK WITH ME?
********************
My clients land jobs. 

✔ I am a Certified Career Strategist with 15+ years of experience

✔ 15 X Awards of Excellence Winner 

✔ Awards of Excellence Judge evaluating Canada's Top Executive Resume Writers

✔ 11 X Certified Canadian Strategist 

✔ 3 X Toast of the Resume Industry (TORI) Award Winner

✔ 6 X contributions to Canadian Career books

✔ Published Career Researcher | McCann, Maureen. Heber, Alex. "Military to Civilian Career Transition." Canadian Journal of Career Development Volume 16, Issue 2 (p. 24-29)

✔ 6 X Presenter and Panelist | Cannexus (Canada’s National Career Development Conference)

✔ 6 X Facilitator and Instructor | Career Foundations | Career Transition Consulting | Resume Development - Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)  | Work-Life Coaching | Marketing Your Practice

✔ Evaluator and Assessor | Certified Resume, Interview, Employment, Worklife and Career Strategists

✔ Featured in Fortune, Forbes, Globe & Mail, Global News, Yahoo Finance, JobScan, CareerWise, Higher Bracket and Job Boom

From 2012-2016, I ran my practice from Europe, then Victoria, British Columbia from 2016-2020. Now, a former expatriate, trailing spouse, and entrepreneur, I work from Ottawa, ON with a global client base focused on securing employment in the Canadian economy. 

===
I have published 40+ articles and 100s of posts with FREE tips, resources and advice you can use right now.  I invite you to explore these; they will provide you with answers to many career problems you're trying to solve on your own.  
===

Promotion Career Solutions | Be in demand | www.mypromotion.ca

profile_positions.description:
I founded PCS to empower people with the expertise to successfully navigate the hiring process and secure audacious career goals.  I believe each of us can love the work we do.

I help you shorten job search times, and together, I do so much more than write your resume and LinkedIn profile (which I do incredibly well because I understand what employers want). I offer customized support in many of the following ways:

* building confidence and resiliency
* stabilizing career foundations and trajectory
* helping manage expectations
* debunking myths and educating individuals about evolving job search processes
* advocating for fair compensation
* diagnosing current and recurring issues, then redirecting towards goal
* uncovering underlying beliefs
* pinpointing ineffective strategies
* clarifying targets for precise focus
* supporting individuals through the job search process

Most people come to me in search of a resume, only to discover that I offer so much more.
profile_positions.title: Owner, Executive Career Strategist

profile_positions.description:
I teach Canada's up-and-coming resume writers and career professionals. As a facilitator and teacher within the Career Development Certificate (CDP) since 2017, I have taught the following courses:

*  Career Transition Consulting (CDP-104)
*  Work-Life Strategies (CDP-102)
*  Marketing Your Career Service (BUS -101)
*  Resume Development for Applicant Tracking Systems (RES-102) 
*  Career Development Foundations, formerly Ethics, Theory, Models & Practice (now CDP-101)

In addition to my work as a facilitator, I am Evaluator and Assessor for Certified Resume, Interview, Employment, Career and Worklife Strategist certifications. I hold the designations of CCDP, CRS, CIS, CCS, CES, CWS, MCRS, MCIS, MCCS, MCES and MCWS.

Since 2012, I have been an Awards of Excellence judge. I have earned 15X Awards of Excellence including Outstanding Canadian Career Leader.
profile_positions.title: Instructor / Course Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
This team is dedicated to helping newly arrived Ukrainians fleeing the war to find job opportunities across Canada.

💙💛 Interested in partnering? - Please email Ana at helpukrainiancanada@gmail.com

The team aims to equip Ukrainian newcomers with more than just a job. We want to help them quickly adjust to the Canadian job market, kickstart their professional networking, and fully leverage their skillset and work experience in Canada. 

This project became possible due to the combined effort of top-rated career advisors located across Canada & US, their friends, professional connections, and other volunteers from across Canada.
The team is actively connecting with community partners to find synergies and discover more opportunities to connect businesses with talent and build a stronger support network for Ukrainian newcomers.

contact.summary:
I am an experienced leader in global operations, project management, business transformation, and crisis management. My main focus is implementing innovative global initiatives, capital projects, and product development. I have directed dozens of projects across industries and continents, managing more than $20 billion in global initiatives over the past 25 years.

I am a seasoned board member who has participated in the board member program and is certified (CCA) by the Brasilian Institute of Corporate Governance (IBGC). I was the first Latin American to become chairman of the board of the Project Management Institute globally, where I served for four years. I am also a member of the advisory board of Yera, an Estonian startup dedicated to improving employee performance and engagement through technology and artificial intelligence.

I share my expertise with millions of professionals around the globe through my "5 Minutes Podcast," which I have hosted since 2007 and has reached 12 million views. I've written 16 books on project management, risk and crisis management, and transformation, which have been translated into six languages and sold over half a million copies.

I am a seasoned speaker and have delivered over 250 keynote addresses in 40 countries. My influence on the sector was affirmed when I became the first Latin American to be elected Chairman of the Project Management Institute.

My work as a venture capitalist and entrepreneur in artificial intelligence, blockchain, big data, chatbots, and machine learning resulted in tools and products that have revolutionized how users bring agility and agile management into project management software.

More than two decades ago, I founded Macrosolutions, a global consulting firm with international operations in energy, infrastructure, IT, oil, and finance.

Between 2016 and 2020, I envisioned and led the Brightline Initiative, a Project Management Institute think tank in partnership with leading organizations dedicated to helping executives bridge the expensive, unproductive gap between strategy design and delivery.

Before Brightline, I was Director of the United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS) Infrastructure and Project Management Group, leading over 1,000 projects and $1.2 billion in humanitarian and development projects. I was also responsible for the first ESG Report in the UN System, published in 2015.

I have a Ph.D. in Civil Engineering, an undergraduate degree in Chemical Engineering, and a master's degree in Industrial Engineering.

projects.description:
In his new YouTube series, Ricardo takes the viewer on a journey through Portugal's countryside, sharing reflections from his 25 years of a global career in 4 episodes. The series is dedicated to young professionals looking to take their first steps in a professional career.

The series does not aim to tell you what kind of career you should choose. It discusses what may make your career joyful and successful.

Ricardo Vargas developed the series as part of his volunteer work. The series had no sponsors and no external financial support. Ricardo also does not work with career counseling or any related career development initiatives for young professionals.

projects.description:
With the surge of COVID-19, I prepared a video and an exposure assessment to help business people and project managers to understand the actual impact of coronavirus in your project, initiative, or product development. 

The assessment comprises 20 statements about aspects of your project or initiative that may be directly or indirectly impacted by COVID-19. 

The assessment is available for free under a Creative Commons Licence, and it was downloaded by more than 4,000 people globally.
