projects.description: In 2016, shortly after his time at the United Nations, he decided to document the lives of some of the most fascinating people from the Zaatari refugee camp in the Mafraq desert in Jordan. Zaatari is an illustration of the tragedy of war. Amidst extreme violence, millions of men, women and children flee for an indefinite period. In partnership with Ana Cláudia Streva (NóS), Ricardo developed the treatment of the film and participated in the recordings of Zaatari: Memories of the Labyrinth, a film directed by Paschoal Samora. The film was released in Europe and Brazil in 2018 and is a co-production of the German Gebrueder Beetz Filmproduction in partnership with the Brazilian Grifa Filmes, Nós, Globo Filmes, Globo News and Canal Brasil.

projects.description:
A long-time venture capitalist and early adopter of using the digital economy to animate the world of project management, I founded and operated PMOtto.ai, a cutting-edge virtual assistant named “Otto” that turns natural language into machine learning to revolutionize project outcomes. 

PMOtto uses a multiplatform environment to bridge the gap between users and tools. I employed machine learning algorithms to help Otto analyze past performance to provide advice to project managers on topics including project risks, resource allocation, and budget forecasts.

PMOtto was developed in partnership with Allan Rocha, one of the most active experts in project portfolio management tools, and Proactive AS, a leading IT organization in Scandinavia. In 2020, Proactive AS assumed 100% of PMOtto, incorporating it into their products and services.

profile_positions.description:
With a focus on implementing innovative global initiatives, capital projects, and product development, I developed Macrosolutions, an international consulting firm with operations in energy, infrastructure, IT, oil, and finance, in 1999. In the past two-plus decades, I have managed more than $20 billion in global initiatives in Brazil, Africa, the Middle East, the United States, and Europe.

As part of my consulting work, I advised companies with merger and acquisition projects, digital transformation, bankruptcy protection, and significant expansion of operations, among other activities. Throughout these two decades, Macrosolutions became my platform to work as a venture capitalist and entrepreneur, spanning artificial intelligence, blockchain, big data, chatbots, and machine learning, and it has led to the creation of tools and products that have revolutionized how users bring agility and agile management into project management software.

As part of my work, I developed customized project management and product development workshops to meet challenges faced by project management and leadership students and practitioners. 

In 2005, I received the PMI Award as the best Project Management training worldwide for the PMDome Workshop. PMDome is a role-playing training in a small-group format to help students undertake complex projects making use of simple things and best practices (www.pmdome.com).

PMFits workshop focus on program management, employing, in an innovative way, case studies, a set of programs, and decision-making models to help participants determine the ideal mix of projects to undertake (www.pmfits.com).

PMRank focuses on project portfolio management to facilitate practitioners in understanding the most effective project composition (www.pmrank.com).

More than 15,000 people worldwide attended these workshops in open-enrollment and in company events.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Managing Partner

profile_positions.description:
As the Founder and Managing Director of PMOtto.ai, I've channeled my passion for project management into creating an AI-powered assistant that harnesses the intelligence of GPT-4. PMOtto.ai operates on three distinctive layers, starting with GPT-4's large language models, progressing to a comprehensive database of project management resources, and culminating in an enterprise layer that can be personalized with each organization's unique data.

Our mission is to continually expand our dataset with each new partnership, aspiring to create the most extensive repository of global project information available. PMOtto.ai marries generative AI and natural language processing to facilitate intuitive and productive interactions, as if you were conversing with a fellow project manager.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Managing Partner

profile_positions.description:
Ricardo is an Artificial Intelligence, Technology, Innovation, and Project Management professor for the Board of Directors Training Program (Programa de Formação de conselheiros). 

He uses his real-world experience as a venture capitalist and entrepreneur in technology, associated with his international experience in project management, to support the executives attending the program to think critically and plan strategically in today's fast-paced business world.
profile_positions.company: IBGC - Instituto Brasileiro de Governança Corporativa
profile_positions.title: Board Member Certification Program Instructor

company.name: IBGC - Instituto Brasileiro de Governança Corporativa

profile_positions.description:
Yera helps companies to achieve fantastic customer service and foster the engagement and development of their agents. With our science-based approach, companies can quickly achieve a 37% increase in CSAT, 14% more upsells, and 48% higher employee engagement.
Ricardo acts as a member of the advisory board supporting the business strategy and project execution. Ricardo also acts as an ambassador of Yera to clients and potential clients.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
I created and launched the Project Management Institute think tank that brings together leading global organizations into a coalition dedicated to helping senior executives bridge the expensive, unproductive gap between strategic design and delivery, the gap between ideas and results.

Under my leadership, we released the Brightline Transformation Compass: pioneering a human-centric approach to transformation. The framework proposes an innovative new way for organizations to implement initiatives by putting people at the center of transformation. As part of our advocacy, I led the development and delivery of a Coursera Massive Open Online Course on “Bridging the Gap Between Strategy Design and Delivery,” viewed by more than 28,000 students around the globe. 

One of the pillars of our work was to develop a strong coalition of organizations to support our research work and outreach. I brought into the coalition and the academic collaboration the following organizations: Boston Consulting Group, Netease, Bristol-Myers Squibb, Lee Hecht Harrison (Adecco), Saudi Telecom, Agile Alliance, MIT, Duke University, Insper Brazil, IESE, University of Tokyo and Technology University of Denmark.

In order to deliver the results, I put in place a small, diverse core team of eight people from seven nationalities living in eight different locations. Using business agility and startup mindset, we produced four books with more than 25,000 copies published and downloaded, four global research works with The Economist Intelligence Unit, Quarts Creative, and Harvard Business Review, one set of Guiding Principles for execution with more than 20,000 copies distributed in 10 languages, and we’ve hosted 43 events in 14 countries. More than 41 million people around the world have attended a Brightline TED Salon.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director

profile_positions.description:
In 2012, I received a very unexpected call with an invitation to consider a senior post in the United Nations system. After weeks of discussion, I decided to shift directions and move with my family to Denmark to lead the Project Management and Infrastructure area of the United Nations Office for Project Services.

My team and I managed over 1,000 projects and $1.2 billion in more than 120 countries. The work included refugee camps, rural roads, maternity clinics,s and housing efforts, as well as managing the sustainability program and global reporting initiative, where we pioneered sustainability efforts and, under my supervision, the first ESG / Sustainability report in the United Nations system was published in 2015.

During this time, I had the chance to live in one of the most developed cities on earth: Copenhagen, and, at the same time, travel on missions to dozens of very challenging environments, including Afghanistan, Iraq, South Sudan, Haiti, Niger, the West Bank, and Gaza.
profile_positions.title: Director, Infrastructure and Project Management Group

profile_positions.description:
One key aspect of my passion and drive is volunteer work. I started engaging with PMI in 1998 when I became the sponsor and founder of PMI in Minas Gerais state, Brazil. Subsequently, PMI invited me to be the first mentor for Latin America, supporting all regional chapters and managing the chapter’s unification and collaboration throughout Brazil. 

In 2006 I received the invitation to run for the global board of PMI. I got elected PMI Director at Large by the membership. In addition, I oversighted the management, control, and supervision of the business, accountable to the worldwide membership. 

After two years serving as a board member, I was elected by my fellow board members to become Chairman of the board in 2009. It was the first time that a Latin American volunteer reached the highest position inside the institute, and the first time a board member was elected Chairman with only two years of service.
profile_positions.title: Chairman Of The Board / Board Member

profile_positions.description:
I started my career with two partners by founding AeC in Brazil. This company of three employees grew to 1,500 before I left to pursue international work and stands strong at 40,000 team members today, and I am extremely proud of my legacy that endures from these early stages.

During my time at AeC, I initiated the training area; further, during the dot-com boom in 1999, I led our efforts in tech development and consulting services, mainly in capital projects, ERP, and technology, encompassing more than 400 consultants.

Today, I continue to enjoy the progress and success of my two partners, who are still leading AeC.
profile_positions.title: Managing Partner / Shareholder

profile_positions.description: In 2000/2001, when project management concepts started to encompass program and portfolio management, FIA invited me to develop the content and approach for the first portfolio management module for an MBA in Project Management in Brazil. I was one of the first practitioners to become a professor of portfolio management in the country and one of the pioneers in the use of the Analytical Hierarchy Process in project selection globally. During these 13 years, I had more than 2,000 students in 50 classes.
profile_positions.title: Portfolio Management Professor at the MBA Program

company.name: Fundação Instituto de Administração - Universidade de São Paulo (FIA/USP)

profile_positions.description:
When FGV launched its initial MBA in project management, they invited me to join the first group of professors to teach within the newly created MBA program. I pioneered the classes focused on crisis, risk management and communications in complex project environments, with more than 200 classes in 21 cities across Brazil. 

More than 4,000 MBA students at FGV had their first contact with project management in my classes. Several of them are now leading top organizations in the area of project management and technology.
profile_positions.title: Risk and Crisis Management Professor at the MBA Program

zFull.summary:
I am an experienced leader in global operations, project management, business transformation, and crisis management. My main focus is implementing innovative global initiatives, capital projects, and product development. I have directed dozens of projects across industries and continents, managing more than $20 billion in global initiatives over the past 25 years.

I am a seasoned board member who has participated in the board member program and is certified (CCA) by the Brasilian Institute of Corporate Governance (IBGC). I was the first Latin American to become chairman of the board of the Project Management Institute globally, where I served for four years. I am also a member of the advisory board of Yera, an Estonian startup dedicated to improving employee performance and engagement through technology and artificial intelligence.

I share my expertise with millions of professionals around the globe through my "5 Minutes Podcast," which I have hosted since 2007 and has reached 12 million views. I've written 16 books on project management, risk and crisis management, and transformation, which have been translated into six languages and sold over half a million copies.

I am a seasoned speaker and have delivered over 250 keynote addresses in 40 countries. My influence on the sector was affirmed when I became the first Latin American to be elected Chairman of the Project Management Institute.

My work as a venture capitalist and entrepreneur in artificial intelligence, blockchain, big data, chatbots, and machine learning resulted in tools and products that have revolutionized how users bring agility and agile management into project management software.

More than two decades ago, I founded Macrosolutions, a global consulting firm with international operations in energy, infrastructure, IT, oil, and finance.

Between 2016 and 2020, I envisioned and led the Brightline Initiative, a Project Management Institute think tank in partnership with leading organizations dedicated to helping executives bridge the expensive, unproductive gap between strategy design and delivery.

Before Brightline, I was Director of the United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS) Infrastructure and Project Management Group, leading over 1,000 projects and $1.2 billion in humanitarian and development projects. I was also responsible for the first ESG Report in the UN System, published in 2015.

I have a Ph.D. in Civil Engineering, an undergraduate degree in Chemical Engineering, and a master's degree in Industrial Engineering.

awards.description:
The PMI Fellow Award is PMI's highest and most prestigious individual award, recognizing members who have made sustained and significant contributions to the project management profession and the Institute for more than a decade. Since 1982, the PMI Fellow Awards have honored the best of the best from diverse industries and regions. 

These leaders have the vision and passion for making significant and lasting contributions to the project management profession and PMI.

Ricardo is the first Brazilian and the first Portuguese citizen to be awarded.

https://awards.pmi.org/#ricardo

contact.summary:
With over 20 years’ experience working for the likes of Microsoft and Google, Roberto Croci’s passion lies in innovation, startups and PEOPLE. Relationship driven, he has bridged the gap between corporates and startups across more than 20 countries, helping them develop real solutions that solve real world problems.

A leading innovator in developing ecosystems where startups thrive, Roberto’s expertise and candid approach have kept him in demand with major tech companies throughout his career. In his current role as the Managing Director of Microsoft for Startups, Roberto is building Microsoft’s new division from scratch, including spearheading its expansion and innovation strategy, with the vision to foster a collaborative startup ecosystem to create a better, brighter future for people around the world. Connecting the dots between startups, government agencies and private sector organizations, Roberto helps organizations adopt the innovation mindset and leverage the technology and nimbleness that startups provide. With an ability to cut through the noise, he works directly with startup founders and encourages them to “think differently” and to “be more curious.” 

Roberto is passionate about mentoring young people, helping them develop an entrepreneurial mindset to search for solutions to problems they see in their community, country, or across the globe. He regularly speaks at prominent universities, including Abu Dhabi University and Zayed University, as well as within local school systems, such as the GEMS schools. His vision is to inspire 1 million students and entrepreneurs to build homegrown tech startups that evolve to become global Unicorns.

An in-demand international speaker, Roberto speaks about authentic and creative leadership, employee engagement, mental health, innovation and digital transformation, funding and startups.

In his personal world, Roberto enjoys reading hardcover books, hiking, running, and spending 
time with his family. He has summited K2, the second highest mountain in the world. He enjoys building relationships with passionate, driven people from all sectors, cultures, and walks of life.

For keynotes, business and media inquiries, please email Roberto's brand manager Sandra at sandra@prestidgegroup.com
contact.title: Founder & CEO
contact.titleDescription:
Constructive Rebels is a transformation company. We’ve built a proven system that helps individuals and organizations to overcome the barriers – such as fear, habits and routine - and to focus on the sources required to create breakthrough change. Grounded in years of experience from companies like Microsoft & Google, we are using new tools, and re-designed tools, to help individuals and organizations break rules that hold them back, in a constructive way, dream bigger, and create measures that can guide anyone navigating new territory. 

WHAT WE DO
> Helping corporates and government entities drive innovation, through startups                                                                                                                                    > Setting up successful growth labs and accelerators in-house                                                                                                         > Breaking rules in a constructive way by doing experiments
> Growth strategies, culture setting, decision-making for innovative leaders
> Mentorship and venture building for growth-stage startups

WHO WE SERVE
For large corporates who want to be innovative as start-ups, and for growth-stage startups who want to think big

profile_positions.description:
Started Microsoft for Startups Middle East & Africa new business unit from scratch.

Responsible for the strategy, P&L, investments and initiatives of Microsoft’s transformation plans with startups and VCs for the Middle East & Africa region.

Built and launched a new VC fund (fundraised $15m from UAE/Saudi government entities and deployed initial investments in 15 startups).

Spearheading initiatives and strategic partnerships with governments, international organizations, NGOs, VCs, investors, Family Offices, ecosystem players and enterprises to support innovative startups, skill the current and future workforce, influence policy-making and fuel a knowledge-based digital economy to enhance Middle East & Africa’s global competitiveness.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director, Microsoft for Startups MEA

profile_positions.description:
Serve as head of sales & marketing, charged with formulating strategic direction by recruiting, onboarding and leading a team of +20 people, operating across Emerging markets to support aggressive growth on Google Marketing Platforms. Run Google Marketing Platforms business (commercial) in EMEA Emerging Markets (Middle East, Africa, Russia, Turkey, Israel) and regional sales transformation programs related to sales execution and pipeline generation. Growing the business (actual) to 150% YoY.

Planning and executing digital marketing strategies. Designed and rolled out a new sales operating model for the region including cadence, collaboration, organization, roles and responsibilities, including KPIs.

Coaching first line of managers to successfully lead, motivate and manage their teams.

Got the highest rate across the EMEA management team in the annual Google Geist manager survey across all relevant dimensions, including Retention, Performance Management, Career Development, Well-being, Priorities, Acting on Feedback, Getting Work Done and Managing Teams.
profile_positions.title: Regional Head - Google Marketing Platforms - EMEA Emerging Markets

profile_positions.description:
Hired, built and managed a team of Sales Executives across 9+ countries to launch, commercialize and sell Google's suite of Analytics products in Southern Europe (France, Italy, Spain), Eastern Europe (Russia, Poland, Czech Republic), Middle East, Turkey and Africa. 

Responsible for defining and executing our Go-to-Market in Strategic Accounts segment, as well as aligning with Global team (working closely with Global Director). 

Coaching our strategic sales team, leading internal and external ecosystem, driving pipeline development, engaging directly with c-level executives and value realization. 

Grew company’s revenue and number of clients by over 5x within 3 years, overachieving sales targets 11 quarters in a row and our suite of products were adopted by most of the largest advertisers across Southern and Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa.
profile_positions.title: Regional Head of Sales, Google Analytics 360 - Southern & Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa

profile_positions.description:

Team empowerment across 10 different cities, career & performance development, coaching, mentoring, bottom's up objective and goal setting along with team building.
profile_positions.title: Manager Solution Consultants - Doubleclick - Southern & Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa

profile_positions.description:
Responsible to design and organize the strategic sales & marketing functions and the customer operations functions for the development of a startup B2C brand called Skitsch (design sector) at a worldwide level in line with the business plan targets.

Lead a team of cross-functional experts across three different business units: Strategy Consultancy (for all projects), Technology (for the development of the ecommerce, app and data integrations) and branding & communication (involving Marketing, Creative and PR processes) to launch and activate the startup sales channels of retail, e-commerce, call centers and export companies. 

Launched Skitsch’s e-commerce website. Opened 3 Retail locations in Milan, London, Paris. 

Selected and activated the Logistics and Call Center partners. 

Defined the internationalization and export strategy.

Grew the e-commerce business with a 300% YoY increase in year 2.

awards.description:
This updated digital course is for individuals who want to develop a fundamental understanding of the AWS Cloud, independent of any specific technical role. You’ll learn about AWS Cloud concepts, core AWS services, security, architecture, pricing, and support to build your AWS Cloud knowledge. This course will also help you prepare for the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam.

Course Objectives

In this course, you will learn how to:

Summarize the working definition of AWS

Differentiate between on-premises, hybrid-cloud, and all-in cloud models

Describe the basic global infrastructure of the AWS Cloud

Explain the six main benefits of the AWS Cloud

Describe and provide an example of the core AWS services, including compute, network, database, and storage services

Identify an appropriate solution using AWS Cloud services for various use cases

Describe the AWS Well-Architected Framework

Explain the AWS Shared Responsibility Model

Describe the core security services within the AWS Cloud

Describe the basics of AWS Cloud migration

Articulate the financial benefits of the AWS Cloud for your organization’s cost management

Define the core billing, account management, and pricing models

Explain how to use pricing tools to make cost-effective choices for AWS services
awards.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

Building the team with the right mindset helps the organisation create the proper infrastructure, establish the right system, standardise the process with their 100% focus on the set goals, and learn the art of saying no.

What’s in the Name?

Well, a lot.

Hence before naming this as ZAPRO here is what we pondered over.

Your organisation goal is to reach the zenith of productivity, that’s Z. We all have a beginning, which means starting from A. Finally, we are looking at the growing your productivity from the beginning to the zenith, hence PRO.

That’s how the ZAPRO Consultants was born, to build productivity mindset for your organisation, one step at a time.

𝑽𝒊𝒔𝒊𝒐𝒏:
Our vision is to bring in productivity mindset for the organisations and individuals, where efficiency and effectiveness are at equilibrium.

𝑴𝒊𝒔𝒔𝒊𝒐𝒏:
At Zapro Consultants, we are committed and hands-on in implementing the DIVE strategy for building a productivity mindset, creating autonomous work culture.

𝑶𝒖𝒓 𝒂𝒑𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒂𝒄𝒉:
We begin with a goal in mind, and we help you stay focused.
We work with clients to create a concrete, achievable vision ‘the zenith’, then analyse the current state, which is the beginning of this transformative journey, and finally provide professional services to improve and enhance your organisation’s productivity mindset.

The most critical factor influencing an organisation’s success is “productivity mindset”.
Do you know that when you think activity equals productivity, you are getting trapped like 83% of organisations who are being busy yet achieving little!

Let’s focus on building a productivity mindset instead.

Only A focused mind can access conscious and unconscious resources than a busy mind.

Connect with us for free Discovery Call
Connect@zaproconsultants.com
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
In 2018 I, stumbled upon Anna McAfee's concept of #LinkedInLocal, a global initiative that breathed life into the virtual connections fostered on LinkedIn, transforming them into real-world relationships through not-for-profit meetups. Enchanted by the idea of enabling meaningful connections beyond screens, I embarked on a transformative journey that would culminate in the birth of the LinkedIn Local Hyderabad community.

Anna McAfee's brainchild encapsulated three core value that resonated deeply with Sagar and laid the cornerstone for his endeavour:

1. People Are Worth Meeting
2. Stories Are Worth Sharing
3. Collaboration not competition

From Oct 2018 to August 2022, Sagar's commitment bore remarkable fruit:

1800 Attendees

45 Speakers

7 Facilitators

Curated 9 Theme-based Events, along with the food being served also aligned to the theme.

The community embraced its social responsibility, contributing to an orphanage and channelling the power of unity to nurture business partnerships.

The spotlight shone on four startups, providing them a stage to unveil their dreams and innovations before a receptive audience.

Two speakers emerged as global professionals, harnessing the platform to share their expertise on international stages.

The Hyderabad chapter etched its name in the annals of global recognition, reaching the prestigious Hall of Fame at Level 3.

The community's impact reached far beyond networking, as it donated approximately INR 1,50,000/-, serving as a beacon of positive change.

As the journey continued, Sagar's relocation to Vadodara marked a transition in leadership. The LinkedIn Local Hyderabad community was handed over to a capable core team based in the city, a testament to the legacy he had meticulously crafted.

contact.summary:
You can attract new clients and make more money on LinkedIn.

Yes, even you!

Even if you’re uncomfortable being ‘out there'.

Even if you struggle with social media and digital platforms.

Even if you’ve tried it before and it didn’t work.

What you need is proper, in-depth, individualized training and coaching.

Learning and mastering the basics.

Being taught an effective but simple and achievable process.

Having someone listen, coach, support, and yes sometimes challenge, until you grasp it and see success.

Just listen to our many testimonials from ambitious and successful business consultants.

They were like you. Uncertain. Frustrated. Sceptical.

And now they are seeing regular inbound inquiries, responses to their direct messages, and hugely increased visibility online. This has led to breath-taking increases in new revenue and a 500% average ROI from our course.

There are no secret sauces or magic bullets, and we are not ‘gurus’ or ‘ninjas’.

We fell for that once ourselves, which is what led us here.

You will need to invest some time and money.

But you will be guaranteed to get it back, many times over.

We don’t judge ourselves on how nice we are and whether our clients ‘like us’ (although we are, and they do). 

We measure our work by the tangible financial results our clients directly attribute to our training. 

By the end of the course, you can skip off into the sunset empowered and inspired to use LinkedIn to grow your business.

You will have;

 A deep understanding of your customer, how to tap into their pain points, and explain how you solve their problem
 A powerful LinkedIn Profile
 A strategy to target your audience and build a relevant network of senior-level connections and followers
 The ability to create engaging and authoritative thought leadership content
 An outbound marketing and follow up process that opens doors with natural, non-salesy, productive conversations leading to new inquiries

You’ll have unlocked the incredible power and potential of LinkedIn, overhauled the way you approach new business, and embedded our process. 

The staggering financial results will continue long after you leave us.

Clients have described our course as ‘game-changing’, the results they’ve seen ‘remarkable’, and the investment ‘the best money they’ve ever spent on suppliers in their business. 

What we teach is different. It’s surprisingly fun to learn and implement. It works. And we are by your side the whole way holding your metaphorical hand.

To find out more and book your place, contact us now.

https://taketwobrothers.co.uk/

volunteer_experiences.description:
VCASCharity.org  (501c3)
FundRaised 131k in 19 days. Organized fundraising events to celebrate the men and women who have served our country and deserve the love and companionship of our favorite furry four-legged friends! All proceeds to the benefit of Veteran Companion Animal Services (VCAS) 
American veterans and military families have made many seen and unseen sacrifices for our country. VCAS is a Central Ohio non-profit dedicated to enriching the lives of veterans, military families, and dogs through the many benefits of the human-animal bond. Your support of VCAS will further their mission of placing rescue dogs in the homes of veterans and military families where companion animal ownership will be beneficial and create routine, fulfillment, and joy for these brave men, women, and their families.
VCAS provides financial support that assists with general care costs, training, and veterinary expenses so that companion animal ownership is an option and not a burden.

profile_positions.description:
(Homesite acquired by American Family Insurance)

Intrapreneur award winner 🏆 for leading several key ML projects
  

1. Spearheaded the development of end-to-end ML pipeline to predict retention elasticity among customers. Leveraged Cloud Run and Kubernetes in GCP to build and enhance AI-driven tools to enable better decision making, achieve KPIs by delivering better data products.

2. Led data scientists and data engineers to  design a ML pipeline to monitor the outliers in several key business metrics by leveraging Docker and Apache Airflow. 

3. Development of AI based app using Streamlit to visualize data and steer effective communication with the stakeholders. This has been a key intrapreneural effort that currently supports many end users including product managers. 

4. Currently involved in identifying key metrics to monitor for budget and planning data for all operating companies, partners and channels.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
1. Research and development of unsupervised, deep-learning based, image segmentation and analysis models. Build pipelines for fast and accurate interpretation of real world complex data. Patent filed.

2. Developed deep learning models for detecting and selective filtering of coherent noise from image and time-series data. Achieved 98% performance accuracy and deployed containerized models into the production environment.

3. Built improved predictive models using Python and R for several domain-specific big data problems.

4. Created powerful visualization using Power BI and Tableau to communicate data insights to business clients.

5. Frequently collaborated with product managers, software teams, and other scientists to ensure product success.

6. Actively provided practical ML solutions to customers and internal teams. Help customers deploy their models in production environment. Research and evaluate state-of-the-art ML methods.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Scientist

profile_positions.description:
Projects in Machine Learning

1. Object detection, localization, and retrieval of nearest neighbor with LSH  - Used hard negative mining to handle class imbalance on MS-COCO dataset during object localization and also implemented Stochastic Dual Coordinate Ascent method for attaining faster optimization by 10%.

2. Sentiment analysis on amazon food reviews- End to end implementation and deployment of a web application that classifies sentiments based on food reviews. The application was created with flask and deployed on the Heroku platform. Used pretrained word embedding and NLTK package to build the LSTM based pipeline.

3. Exploring the night sky - Built an automated multi-class classification pipeline of detecting astronomical objects by using photometric redshift data from Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) .
profile_positions.title: Graduate Student

profile_positions.description: Numerical simulation and optimization of space probe landing on Europa’s rocky surface.  The modeling efforts are centered about two modeling formulations: smoothed particle hydrodynamics (SPH) and the arbitrary Lagrangian-Eulerian (ALE) set of techniques.

contact.summary:
From a shy, under-confident, low self-esteem ridden boy to a TEDx Speaker, a passionate facilitator, a storytelling coach & the co-founder of an award-winning global leadership development company-  that’s been my journey over the last 22 years. 

I have a background in traditional Learning & Development – something I got into 22 years ago –  a huge turning point in my career. 

My underpinning irrational belief that I’m “not good enough” – turned out to be my biggest weapon on my journey to become among the best at what I do. 

I invested myself in mastering the craft of training, facilitation and solution design, though a relentless pursuit of excellence.

My quest took me to through two journeys – the first 12 years I worked for many world leading companies like GE – playing roles from Trainer to Global Head of L&D.

I won numerous awards, accolades and grew very fast - This journey was my “becoming” a thorough L&D professional.

My second journey was the one that moved me from “becoming” to “being”. 

1 Breakthrough workshop that revealed myself to me.
2 Coaches who showed me the mirror

 1 Mentor who taught me the ropes of “real facilitation"

1 pilot project with over 500 managers transformed through this unique approach and most importantly. 

A loving spouse who had more belief in me than I ever did – is what it took for me to Experiment & Refine my lessons from my transformation and build something that could enable transformation in others – and TransforMe was born in 2012. 

Today the problems we solve for our 120+ global clients like Google, United Nations, Accenture, McKinsey, Adobe, Walmart and many others – are the Leadership Challenges of today. 

Enabling leaders to become more inspiring and influencing, making teams more synergized, building a strong leadership pipeline, improving relationship management, learning to work though crisis are the most common ones. 

And the reason we’ve been able to consistently deliver results for our clients is because of HOW we solve these problems. 

Our unique methodologies – that we discovered, experienced & refined, while adding deep expertise in breakthrough methods like T-Group, NLP, Gestalt, Neuroscience, Storytelling and Systemic Coaching – is what makes results happen.

I am still on my quest to transform a billion lives – the map keeps expanding – and I keep learning & evolving!

If you would like to talk, you can reach me at +61 434747296 or gatik@transformelearning.com.

Here’s our website - www.transformelearning.com

profile_positions.description:
Awarded as the Best Results based Learning solutions (2017) and Top 20 Most Promising workforce development company (2018), TransforMe is a new age learning organisation committed to building deep-rooted talent development practices. Our unique 'transformational' methodologies drive tangible business results.

We are recognised in: 
- BLP: Breakthrough Leadership Journey 
- Evolve: a powerful Woman leadership program
- Synergising Strengths: bringing the power of 'Transformative Teams' 
- The Art of Storytelling: to Influence, Engage & Inspire
- Coaching: Systemic | Leadership | Purpose
- Making Inclusion Real: a DEI program that inspires change 


Our highly accredited and industry recognised professionals have gone through deep self-work and rigorous training before they embark on enabling progressive change in people. Its a life purpose work for most of them, which sets us apart in the Learning & Development industry. 

We are a global company with corporate offices in Australia and India. Our business model is based on word of mouth and repeat work. This gives us the privileged to partner with 150 organisations globally, 90% inbound business, 95% repeat work. Some of them include - UN, Google, PWC, EY, Accenture, Mckinsey & Co, TikTok, Ericsson, Monotype, Schneider Electric, Adobe, Uber, Walmart Flipkart, Samsung, Nestle, etc.

contact.summary:
Hi, I am Nikhil - a storyteller, content creator and educator. 

Let's get straight to the point. 

Here's a harsh truth - 99% of us FAIL to get credit for what we do. 

Not because we DON'T work hard. But because we FAIL terribly to communicate our VALUE.

We've been trained to believe that if you put your head down and work, someday somebody will notice your hard work and might give you a promotion.

NOPE, that doesn't work.

The reality is - In a digital-first society,

"Your ability to COMMUNICATE your value speaks much louder than your HARD WORK."

And this is exactly where Personal Branding comes into play!


It's ALL about telling the world how talented you're by communicating your VALUE in the most compelling manner.

CEOs use it to hire people, raise funding, and get PR. 

But is Personal Branding only for CEO's? No, it isn't. It is meant for everyone:

For Corporate Professionals. 
For Sales Professionals.
For Entrepreneurs.
For Marketers.
For Students. 
For Actors.


With a STRONG Personal Brand, you can make your PROFILE stand out & DOMINATE 99+% of LinkedIn Profiles.

It helps you:

• Become a "go-to" person in your industry & position yourself as an Authority.
• Build Thought Leadership in your industry.
• Create seriously SCROLL-STOPPING CONTENT that boosts engagement.
• NEVER AGAIN think about what to post.
• Build an engaged audience that can afford to pay you.
• Consistently generate inbound leads & choose to only work with those who resonate well with YOU.


In the past 10 months, I have assisted: 

200+ Founders with 1:1 strategic consultations
75+ students mentored
700+ stories written
5 Million+ views

Helped 34+ entrepreneurs and C-suite executives skyrocket their personal brands.



How can I help you:-

👉Complete LinkedIn Management - Writing the most engaging stories for your LinkedIn profile or company page posts. (LinkedIn Ghostwriting)

👉1:1 Growth Strategy Consultation Call - Step-by-step guide to skyrocket your LinkedIn

👉LinkedIn Profile Optimization - Make your profile a 24*7 Landing page.  

👉Corporate sessions/College workshops on Brand Storytelling & Personal Branding 


Still confused, let's have a quick call.


Feel free to drop me a line on LinkedIn
or
You can mail me at nikhil.rocketrush@gmail.com
or contact at: +91 8368205513

I would love to get in touch with you.
Cheers!😊🙌

contact.summary:
If you are here then probably you are looking for ways to get those high-quality B2B leads. 

Because let's be honest getting those quality leads is one of the toughest parts.

But don't worry I'm here to help!

BDW- When I say "LEADS" I basically mean people booking those "APPOINTMENTS" with you. 

Here are some results I got for my clients: (Check out the featured section)

-> My client who is the CEO of an IT company closed a $5000 deal with LinkedIn marketing
-> My client who is a CRO consultant got 5 appointments booked in just one hour 
-> My client who's into SAAS got over 97+ sign-ups in the very first month
-> My client who's a B2B consultant gets 20+ appointments each month

Now, you might be wondering how I achieve these results. The answer is simple!

Having collaborated with over 47+ B2B professionals, I have gained a deep understanding of B2B lead generation. 

Here's my journey:

-> Started as a copywriter 
-> Moved toward social media marketing 
-> And now I'm into B2B lead generation with over 3+ years

My process works because,

I use machine learning models to track the data of people who are already looking for your service. 

And I don't just rely on the outbound process. I also build your brand on LinkedIn making you the expert for your long-term goals. 

If we collaborate then,

Both of your wishes come true:

-> Long-term
-> Short-term

If this seems interesting to you. Then let's talk!

My DMs are always open! :)

Accomplished technology leader with MBA and MS/BS Computer Science credentials -- combined with a passion for leading teams in the design, development, and release of breakthrough software products.

Experience to date centers heavily on the gaming/entertainment space, working on some of the most successful titles in the gaming industry including Destiny, Halo, and Madden -- and involving collaboration with top brands and studio partners around the globe.

Development experience spans the entire SDLC process and all major parts of game development, from tools/infrastructure creation to complex graphics and cloud/online technology implementation.

Areas of expertise include:

•  Cloud strategy and execution
•  Software Design, Development & Engineering (SDLC)
•  Engineering Team Hiring, Mentoring & Supervision
•  Product Strategy, Features & Requirements
•  Organizational Strategy and team design
•  Leadership development

•  Project Management, Scoping, Budgeting & Resource Allocation
•  International Market Research & Ecosystem Development
•  Game Engine Programming & Graphics Development
•  Software Testing & QA Leadership

An avid networker, I welcome all appropriate conversations at Ldeej@hotmail.com.

projects.description:
BugSentry is an error reporting system embedded into all EA console and PC games that provides crucial real-time quality of service data from millions of end-users around the world. BugSentry is a full suite of software ranging from a client SDK, to collection servers, reporting servers, and a data processing backend to handle custom reports and other processing such as callstack translation.

One crucial difference between BugSentry and other crash reporting systems is that BugSentry is compiled into the game executable, it is not an external "watchdog" process; the game is able to report about itself, even when it has crashed. Additionally, other error types can be reported such as desyncs, server connection errors, etc.

Starting out as a grass-roots project for Madden NFL 10, BugSentry has been adopted by AAA franchises such as FIFA, Battlefield, Origin, and many more. This new core technology has dramatically improved product quality and user experience by providing real-time feedback and allowing EA to react more quickly to stability and quality issues. This has also established a new quality metric at EA, allowing titles to measure YoY improvements.

Waleed Cope has taken his passion for business and transformed it into a successful career. From a young age, Waleed developed an interest in businesses, working alongside his family at their laundromat. This experience instilled in him a deep appreciation for the importance of hard work, dedication, client service, and entrepreneurship.

In addition to his work at The Soap Box, Waleed, and his wife also manage their family's security agency, where they provide top-notch security services to global corporations. Waleed's ability to manage multiple businesses simultaneously is a testament to his entrepreneurial spirit.

Waleed is a natural innovator, always looking for ways to improve and grow his businesses by using tools and systems from other industries. volunteer_experiences.description:
The purpose of Community Board 3 is to ensure that city services are accessible and responsive to residents, organizations, businesses, and institutions of Bedford-Stuyvesant.  By hosting regular meetings open to the public, CB 3 acts as a conduit for communicating events, addressing local concerns, and processing municipal applications of various sorts.  CB 3 also plays an important advisory role in planning, land use, zoning, and the City budget.

Board Composition & Membership

Community boards are local representative bodies. There are 59 community boards throughout the City, and each one consists of up to 50 unsalaried members, half of whom are nominated by their district’s City Council members. Board members are selected and appointed by the Borough Presidents from among active, involved people of each community and must reside, work, or have some other significant interest in the community.

Each community board is led by a District Manager who establishes an office, hires staff, and implements procedures to improve the delivery of City services to the district. While the main responsibility of the board office is to receive complaints from community residents, they also maintain other duties, such as processing permits for block parties and street fairs. Many boards choose to provide additional services and manage special projects that cater to specific community needs, including organizing tenants associations, coordinating neighborhood cleanup programs, and more.
